data.title: Just Okay
data.text: It was just okay typical buffet food, Sushi was really good though! I probably will not go back. Service was okay as well.

data.title: Entertaining and Great Food
data.text: If you want to be entertained by watching the chef prepare your food, then this is the place to go. You don't eat and run so plan on enjoying your dining experience. The kids loved it too because they got to be involved in the fun. You leave feeling very satisfied after great food!

data.title: It's a buffet place.
data.text:
The food was ok. Nothing special from any other like buffet. 

Not good enough for me to come back again, as the price was steep for the quality

data.title: Best Buffet in the Area
data.text: Hibachi Grill is relatively new to the area (less than 10 yrs) but I feel it is the best Chinese buffet around. They have a wide variety of dishes to sample that re HOT and not luke warm to cold. The Mongolian barbecue station is my favorite because you can pick the meats and vegetable you want to including shrimp and they prepare it on their huge tepan area. You also can have NY strip steak as part of your buffet. Every time my daughter returns home from college a trip to Hibachi is a must!!! Highly recommend!!
